original_text: So they began to tell everyone about Jesus. Because of this, people in all the places near Capernaum heard the news about Jesus.
korean_text: 이에 예수의 소문이 그 근처 사방에 퍼지니라

sentences.original_text: So they began to tell everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 모든 사람에게 말하기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: people in all the places near Capernaum
